artist: Engraver: Thomas A. E. Chambars; Painter: After Peter Oliver
description: half length portrait of artist facing right and looking at viewer; wearing jacket with large white falling collar with lace trim; wide brimmed hat; in an oval; illustration from Walpole's "Anecdotes of Painting in England" Vol 2
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black:  Vol.2 p.12 / seipse pinx\'t   T. Chambars sculp / PETER OLIVER | below image in pencil: 2-138 /  \"this is the only engraved portrait of this artist, there is an etching. Anonymous\"
title: Portrait of Peter Oliver
